metadata.subject: Henry IV, King of France, 1553-1610
Chastel, Jean, -1594
metadata.title: Arrest de la Cour ensemble les vers et discours latins escrits sur marbre noir en lettres d'or és quatre faces de la base de la pyramide dressee deuant la grande porte du Palais à Paris
metadata.creator: France.Sovereign (1589-1610 : Henry IV)
France. Sovereign (1589-1610 : Henry IV)
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 1 no. 19
metadata.description: The text within a border of type ornaments

Imperfect: only the left part of the broadside present; this includes the sentence pronounced at the execution of Jean Châtel, 29 Dec. 1594, and Latin verses with caption: Qvod sacrvm votvmqve sit memoriae, perennitati, longaevitati, salutíque maximi, fortiss & clementiss. Principis Henrici IIII. Galliae & Nauarrae, Regis Christianiss
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title and cover pages combined.
